data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Barrigada. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Barrigada, Guam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Barrigada, Guam to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Barrigada, Guam.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
There are 8,900 people living in the state of Barrigada. Only about 1,415 might be believers.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Barrigada, Guam to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Barrigada.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Barrigada, Guam to the gospel today.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Barrigada.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
